His role has often been described as providing "adult supervision" at a company whose young co-founders like to do things in unconventional ways. Eric Schmidt has a great track record and has really steered Google to great success, said Gartner analyst Ray Valdes. lead." Page said Eric Schmidt had done "an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves." The news surprised and worried Google observers. The executive change is very much unexpected, and somewhat of a concern to investors, said Clayton Moran, an analyst at Benchmark Co.. MVP and four-time scoring champion plans to play in his 11th straight All-Star game Feb. 14 at Cowboys Stadium. "My fans still support me. You can't ask for more than that," he said. When you play this game, it's all about the people that come to see you, the people in the stands. For somebody to say the fans don't mean anything, that's crazy. Since joining the team in early December, Allen Iverson has helped the 76ers go 10-13 after a 5-15 start. He entered Saturday averaging 14.2 points, well below his career average, and 4.3 assists.
